6sc rnd4 scinc around 12sc rnd5-rnd7 single_crochet around 12sc rnd8 *scinc single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 18sc rnd9-rnd12 single_crochet around 18sc rnd13 *scinc single_crochet in next 2st repeat from * 6x in total 24sc rnd14-rnd18 single_crochet around 24sc rnd19 *decrease single_crochet in next 2st repeat from * 6x in total 18sc rnd20 single_crochet around 18sc rnd21 *decrease single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 12sc fill with fiber filling finish off assembly make a tree trunk and single_crochet or stitch to the tree pattern copyright © any way print or digitally items made from this pattern may be sold when the designer studiomanya is 6 credited camping tent from cardboard cut out the frame 5x5cm 2x2 inch for the sides 5x4cm 2x1 6 inch for the base and 5x5x4cm 2x2x1 6inch for the triangle back side you can cut them all separately and tape together with duct tape or you outer side can cut them out in one single piece and cut half with tyrian purple chain 23 through and fold on the lines r1-r73 single_crochet across 22sc in between the r74 single_crochet r73 and r1 together 22sc
